page.title: 11RECREATION IN PAXFORD AREA
page.content: Outdoor activities and sports include horse riding,fox hunting,hunting on foot with beagles and basset hounds, rough shooting,fishing,clay pigeon shooting,caravaning,motoring,cycling, dog exercising,walking including organised walks,bird watching,cricket, picnicking,gardening,tennis,jogging & Morris dancing.Indoor activities include reading,writing,music,radio & television,crossword & other puzzles, billiards & snooker,card games including whist drives,board games, darts,dominoes & fruit machines.In Ebrington Church bellringing takes place.Holiday cottages,bed & break- fast accommodation,2 public houses & a guest house offer a setting for further relaxation.
